level.heading: LIMITED LIABILITY PARTNERSHIPS[COLON] STATEMENT OF QUALIFICATION (ยง 17-745)

level.text: 745.1 In addition to the requirements of Chapter 6 (General Partnerships) ofhe Act (D.C. Official Code ยง 29-601.01 et seq. (2011 Repl.)), a partnershipecoming a limited liability partnership shall be in good standing before filingn amendment to or cancellation of the statement of qualification with theuperintendent.
